statements: SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY class_timing DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, capacity FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity <= 10 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity > 30 ORDER BY class_timing DESC;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity >= 20 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity < 15 AND class_timing BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity BETWEEN 10 AND 25 AND class_timing < '15:00:00' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM CourseSchedule WHERE capacity > 30 AND class_timing >= '10:00:00' AND class_timing <= '16:00:00';
SELECT * FROM class_timings;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_timings;
SELECT class_name, capacity FROM class_timings WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT id, class_name FROM class_timings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_capacity WHERE date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM class_timings;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_timings WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY start_time ASC;

SELECT class_capacity.date, class_timings.class_name, class_timings.start_time, class_capacity.available_seats FROM class_capacity JOIN class_timings ON class_capacity.class_id = class_timings.id WHERE class_capacity.available_seats < 20 ORDER BY class_capacity.date DESC;

SELECT class_capacity.date, class_timings.class_name, COUNT(*) as total_classes FROM class_capacity JOIN class_timings ON class_capacity.class_id = class_timings.id GROUP BY class_capacity.date, class_timings.class_name;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time, capacity, CASE WHEN capacity IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE 'Available' END as status FROM class_timings ORDER BY status ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, class_time FROM course_schedule WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT course_id, class_time FROM class_capacity WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity;
SELECT * FROM class_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, class_id, student_id FROM class_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, class_time, capacity FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE class_time > NOW();
SELECT course_name, class_time, capacity FROM course_schedule ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, current_capacity, max_capacity FROM class_capacity WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity;
SELECT * FROM class_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule WHERE class_capacity > 20;
SELECT instructor_name, course_description FROM course_details WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT class_id, class_capacity FROM class_capacity ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, registration_date FROM course_registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_id, instructor_name, course_description FROM course_details ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_capacity, class_availability FROM class_capacity WHERE class_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule JOIN course_registration ON course_schedule.course_id = course_registration.course_id;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule WHERE class_capacity > 30 ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, class_timings FROM course_schedule ORDER BY class_timings DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise_area FROM instructor WHERE expertise_area = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_date, class_time, class_capacity FROM course_class WHERE class_capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE expertise_area = 'Database Management';
SELECT course_name, class_timings FROM course_schedule WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student JOIN enrollment ON student.student_id = enrollment.student_id WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, expertise_area FROM instructor ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, class_date FROM course_schedule JOIN course_class ON course_schedule.course_id = course_class.course_id WHERE class_capacity >= 30 ORDER BY class_date DESC;
